description:
In this course titled ' Hidden Hypnotic Persuasion Techniques ' by Mr. Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn the hidden techniques of persuading and influencing people to like you or the products you are selling effectively. Powerful yet simple techniques are taught in this course which will make you a very powerful sales person and influence people to buy your products .

Persuasion and Influence helps you in every field you are takes you to a different level altogether .

This course is divided into 9 lectures and over 30 minutes of content using live recorded videos.

This course contains -

  1. Introduction To The Course
  2. Praising Technique
  3. How to build your brand covertly
  4. How to compliment others covertly
  5. Learn hypnotic persuasion using anchoring technique
  6. Using negative persuasion covertly
  7. How to master hypnotic persuasion
  8. Review of the lectures
  9. Summary of the course
title: Hidden Hypnotic Persuasion Techniques
